update memberfides0

update memberfides0 set name = #{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, sex = #{sex,jdbcType=TINYINT}, btd = #{btd,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, city = #{city,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, icon = #{icon,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, invite = #{invite,jdbcType=INTEGER}, gp = #{gp,jdbcType=TINYINT}, sta = #{sta,jdbcType=INTEGER}, mtime = #{mtime,jdbcType=BIGINT}, email = #{email,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, bindtime = #{bindtime,jdbcType=INTEGER}, tel = #{tel,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, realname = #{realname,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, identity = #{identity,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, yellowvip = #{yellowvip,jdbcType=TINYINT}, isyearvip = #{isyearvip,jdbcType=TINYINT}, passwd = #{passwd,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, salt = #{salt,jdbcType=CHAR}, lgtm = #{lgtm,jdbcType=INTEGER}, lxlg = #{lxlg,jdbcType=INTEGER}, qq = #{qq,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, address = #{address,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, regip = #{regip,jdbcType=BIGINT}, active_assets = #{activeAssets,jdbcType=TINYINT} where mid = #{mid,jdbcType=INTEGER}
mapper.select: SELECT from memberfides0 order by mid

SELECT mf.name,mf.sex,mf.btd as born ,mf.city,mf.icon, mf.invite,mf.gp AS gameArea,mf.sta as status, FROM_UNIXTIME(mf.mtime,'%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%S') as mtime, mf.email,FROM_UNIXTIME(mf.bindTime,'%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%S') as bindTime,mf.tel,mf.mid, ma.sitemid,mf.identity idCard,mf.yellowvip,mf.isyearvip, mf.passwd as sbId,ma.alevel,FROM_UNIXTIME(ma.mktime,'%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%S') as mktime,ma.belongid, mf.active_assets AS comeFrom,mcg.gold,mcg.vip,mf.lxlg as totalLgin, FROM_UNIXTIME(mf.lgtm,'%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%S') as lastLogin,mcg.bankpasswd,mcg.bankAssets,mf.address, mf.qq from memberfides0 mf LEFT JOIN memberagents ma ON ma.mid = mf.mid left JOIN membercommongame0 mcg ON mcg.mid = mf.mid where mf.mid = #{mid,jdbcType=INTEGER}

SELECT mid, name, sex, btd, city, icon, invite, gp, sta, FROM_UNIXTIME(mtime,'%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%S') as mtimeString, email, bindtime, tel, realname,identity, yellowvip, isyearvip, passwd, salt, lgtm, lxlg, qq, address, regip, active_assets from memberfides0 WHERE mid = #{mid,jdbcType=INTEGER} order by mid
select COUNT(invite) sum from memberfides0 where invite=#{mid}
